name: Jimmy Schmidt's Ginger Puree
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, ginger root, lemon juice, sugar, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups peeled and diced fresh ginger

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, combine all ingredients. Bring to simmer over high heat and cook until tender, about 30 minutes.
Transfer to a food processor and puree until smooth. Strain the contents and reserve in the refrigerator for up to one month.
